name: UDI system
overview: UDI System was founded and launched in the 2010. The founders of UDI System were a group of business people who had vast knowledge in the area of web technology and other services related to the technology. These partners formed UDI System so that they could offer the best services to their customers. The main concern for the company is to give the beats quality and standards in web site technology and offer solutions at the lowest costs possible. The main idea behind the formation of the company is to give a state of the art services to its customers who want assistance in e-commerce establishments, web site and web technology, ERP, consultation services, web maintenance and other web technology related services. At UDI System we believe that our customers should get the best solutions for their problems and we ensure this by following a well-structured and unique approach in solving each of the problems given to us by our customers. It is because of this that we have grown to be one of the best companies in India when it comes to web development and technology. Over the past year, we have seen the number of customers have increased considerably showing that we are giving the right services to our customers.

offices.address1: No 152 Sri Ranga ,12 cross Sarakki main road, JP Nagar 1st phase
